Saturday 31 August 2024


All Day Guest

Thank you for RSVP'ing.
We are so happy that you can join us!

Ceremony: 1pm Port St Mary Church
Reception: from 3pm King Williams College
Evening celebration from 6.3opm

Gifts

We are sending out this invitation
And hope you will join our celebration.
If to send a gift is your intention,
In modesty we would like to mention,
We have a house and contents too
So presents really wouldn’t do
So if it’s on your heart to bless us and send us on our way
a donation to our honeymoon would really make our day!
But, most importantly, we request, That you turn up as our wedding guest.

Menu

Please confirm dietary requirements.

Please complete and submit this invitation before the 15th of June.
